name: Chicken with Chainguns
description: The big bad fox crushed your hen's eggs and you aren't having it...take up arms and show him who is boss! Use your chainguns to get revenge.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1920 x 1080 resolution display Storage: 330 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Quad Core Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: 1920 x 1080 resolution display Storage: 330 MB available space Sound Card: Any
